import React,{Component} from "react" import {Link,withRouter} from "react-router-dom" import Chat from "../component/chat" import question from "../question" import {connect} from "react-redux" import Leaderboard from "../component/leaderboard" class Create extends Component { state={ currentQuestion:{}, currentScore:0 } createARoome(){ } componentDidMount=()=>{ //if(!this.props.connected)this.props.history.push("/") this.setState({ roomId:this.props.roomId , currentQuestion:question[0] }) } handleClick=(e)=>{ console.log(e) } render(){ return (
{/*

  • {this.state.currentQuestion.choiceTwo}
  • {this.state.currentQuestion.choiceThree}
  • {this.state.currentQuestion.choicefour}

) } } const mapDispatchToProps=(dispatch)=>{ return{ loginAthification:(data)=>{ dispatch({ type:"JOIN", data:data}) }, } } const mapstateToProps=(state)=>{ return{ connected:state.connected, roomId:state.roomId } } export default connect(mapstateToProps,mapDispatchToProps) (withRouter(Create))
